TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: I really wish Star Trek had more X-wing fighters and Cylons in it.

Just now, adsii1970 said:

I really wish Star Trek had more X-wing fighters and Cylons in it.

I'll do you one better

Everything Star Trek in the 21st century sounds like it was written by a third grader whose brain has not yet developed reasonable thinking beyond punching people who disagree with them.

(bonus: explains why the bridge crew fights so much. So much for the crew being mature people worthy of being in the military.)
I have heard people say this: "Kerbal is unrealistic because it is just a game and so you cannot trust what happens in it"
If the Earth is spherical, we are living on  top of columns.
The prototypes for the Star Ship Enterprise were yellow and white and at the battle of Yavin.
That's because the whole franchise is absolutely secondary.

Did you say French Fries?

Maybe you mean, "Baguette".

Google any random word, and you get another random rapper using it as a nickname.

Anime and rap are a tsunami of junk flooding the whole google.
Most Star Wars ships have impractical landing gear.

They are expendable. The landing gear should be jettisonned, but the gear jettisonner is broken, so they stay.

Edited May 25, 2022 by kerbiloid
SW isn't physically and mathematically correct.
Can someone translate this for me? I don't speak Spanish. ()
Doctor Who Seasons 5-7 were a dream dreamt up by a paranoid doctor fearing the worst that the new writer could have done to the show, same for Seasons 11-13.
Also SW is the opposite of KSP

KSP lacks the lightsabers.

And doesn't suffer. SW should lack them, too.
Delayed for 5 more years.

The more it takes, the better it works.

→ Half-Life 3 is da best.
Which half of the life was better?
The third one.
Does it have to be canon?
Not necessary. It can be HP. It's better than Canon.
Is HP (Harry Potter) better than IBM (International Broom Monthly)?

The whole Harry The Potter series is a poor attempt of crossing the rural witchery with brooms and urban magic with style, adapted for the kids.
As a result, it's a full shame as a fantasy.

P.S.
And yes, I have forced myself to watch it after having watched tens of amateur parodies on it, when I already had known it from memory, and wanted to know, what all of it was originally.

Edited May 28, 2022 by kerbiloid

Poor attempt, Rich author.

(The books are actually very good.)

Fiction writers are a kind of cannibal species who prey for the weak-willed people money by writing useless verbal stuff and ensuring them that it's very important to read the books and pay their money for that.

Darwin blesses this, satisfied. The excessive money of losers (aka "readers") are owned by winners (aka writers), this is exactly how the evolution works.

Torrents are a negative loopback, ecologically suppressing the writers' greed.

Edited May 28, 2022 by kerbiloid
